p: The leaf extracts from S4 and commercial samples were prepared through sonication for 10 minutes with dichloromethane, followed by centrifugation at 1200 rpm, collection of the supernatants, removal of water residues using Na 2SO 4, and GC-MS analysis. The assay was performed according to KÃ¶nig and Hochmuth [ 19] with minor modifications.
